bind.calculate: if(/data/next_visit_type = "post_partum", today(), if(/data/next_visit_type = "pregnancy", date(/data/next_preg_visit), if(/data/followup_needed = 'yes', date(/data/followup_date), date(/data/next_preg_visit))))

if(/data/total_preg_visits = 0, date(/data/pv1_date), if(/data/total_preg_visits = 1, min(date(today() + 7), date(/data/pv2_date)), if(/data/total_preg_visits = 2, min(date(today() + 7), date(/data/pv3_date)), if(/data/total_preg_visits = 3, min(date(today() + 7), date(/data/pv4_date)), min(date(today() + 7), /data/edd)))))

if(/data/total_anc_visits < 1, date(/data/anc1_date), if(/data/total_anc_visits < 2, date(/data/anc2_date), if(/data/total_anc_visits < 3, date(/data/anc3_date), if(/data/total_anc_visits < 4, date(/data/anc4_date), ''))))

if(today() - /data/conception_date > 84 and /data/total_anc_visits < 1, 'yes', if(today() - /data/conception_date > 168 and /data/total_anc_visits < 2, 'yes', if(today() - /data/conception_date > 224 and /data/total_anc_visits < 3, 'yes', if(today() - /data/conception_date > 252 and /data/total_anc_visits < 4, 'yes', 'no'))))

text.value: Please close this form and open the "Deregister Mother"
Did the mother experience miscarriage or abortion since the last visit?
The delivery date is . Would you like to change it?
Where did you give birth previously?
Have you been told this is a high-risk pregnancy?
How many ANCs have been attended during this pregnancy
Attend your first ANC before 16 weeks of pregnancy?
Receive results of the HIV test?
Iron folate supplements every day this month?
How many IPTp doses were you given during antenatal care?
Did you sleep under an insecticide net every night in last month?
Has the mother eaten less, more, or same as before getting pregnant
Was the father or chosen supporter present during this visit
Does the mother have a danger sign?
No movement from baby in 24 hours
This woman will be discharged. Please answer the following questions about discharge.
Did death occur within 45 days of birth
Thank you. This patient has been deregistered.
This woman has a danger sign and requires a referral. Please answer this referral information.
Prolonged labor / birth delay (12 hours or more)
Placenta is not delivered or incomplete
How many hours since mother first noticed symptoms?
This referral is complete. Referral Id is . Please check back with patient in 48 hours.
This form is complete. The next step is to submit your form.

be levumi ar ley, or be weihun a mbaimbay

ee lembia ndolay kongbai hun na tae ngo hawa pumahu fele ma

ee ya nguni ar hawa pu mahun fele
ee ya guni ar folo yeala

or tae ngoh nji sawa ma
